channel.title: Kali on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Kali on Dash

item.title: Qemu emulated kali
item.description: ###Preparation Create the image file: $ qemu-img create -f qcow2 kali.qcow2 20G Formatting 'kali.qcow2', fmt=qcow2 size=21474836480 encryption=off cluster_size=65536 lazy_refcounts=off $ ls -l -h total 136K -rw-r--r-- 1 Trusty root 193K Apr 25 10:34 kali.qcow2 Since I’ve created the kali, ignore this article.
